pages.text: $(l)Tomb Stone$() is a kind of entity that can summon zombies, it can not spawn naturally, but appears with the $(bred)3th or 4th or 5th huge wave at night$(), and summon zombies when huge wave comingã€‚$(br)$(bred)Features$() : it can only be eaten by $(bgreen)Grave Buster$(), and will drop$(l)at least a copper coin$() when die.
